meta.title: TEFL by Further: Teach English Abroad in South America
meta.description: Live and work in the most beautiful city in South America. Our company provides teacher training so you can teach while living in Buenos Aires!

hero.title: TEFL:
hero.subtitle: Teaching English as a Foreign Language

items.title: Live and Work in Buenos Aires

workAbroad.lead: A hands-on approach to planning, delivering, and evaluating impactful lessons.

cert.title: Certification and Methodology
cert.body1: Master approaches like Communicative Approach, TBL, PPP, and effective assessment techniques used in international classrooms.
cert.body2: Train to plan dynamic lessons, manage groups confidently, and measure progress through guided teaching practice.

items.title: Diagnosis and Goals
items.body: We assess your starting level and objectives to personalize your learning plan.

items.title: Training and Micro-Teaching
items.body: Participate in practical workshops with guided feedback and real classroom simulations.

items.title: Evaluation and Next Steps
items.body: Final portfolio and performance review with concrete results and certification.

items.a: No. We start from the methodological foundations, with guided practice and constant teacher support.
Yes. Our program follows CEFR standards and prepares you to teach English anywhere in the world.
Yes. Graduates are considered for job opportunities within Further Corporate and partner institutions.
